title: login issue
body:
Hi,
I just change to a new computer and I don't know why I can't log in: it says login error (I have 2 accounts and I try both of them and it doesn't work), it recommends me to go to the support league of legends link but when I press the link it says webpage is unavailable. any thought guys?

replies.body:
Hi,

do not uninstall League.

Go to the website and see if you can redownload the installer.

I repeat, do **not** uninstall League.
